title: 7/20/17 - What Americans want most right now
description:
The 12th imam is here? ...The terrible predicament of Charlie Gard's parent as they speak up ...How do we not take a chance when it comes to possibly saving a life? ...Listener Alan Hoyt explains his plight as a forgotten taxpayer in 2017 America ...Glenn sends a special gift to an American who needs it ..Kids are committing suicide because of a game and Stu's a skeptic. ...The tragic ways people seek fame ...

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
